oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aubrey Moncrief interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Minser, Billy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aubrey Moncrief served in 1968, including the Tet Offensive, with the 22nd Medical Group and the 5th Special Forces, part of a Green Beret team. He was trained as an operating room technician. This interview was conducted February 19, 2020, at the Blount County Public Library. Audio interview: http://bit.ly/vv-aubreymoncrief
